name: Nobody Cares About Merlin Prismriver
description:
Made for Touhou Fan Game Jam 9. Stealth game about Merlin Prismriver wherein you pick up and throw or possess and control things/people ... or at least the very basic prototype of that game we were able to make before we ran out of time. Very janky, but kinda funny.

Arrow keys: move
Down: Duck, drop held item
Z: Pick up, throw
X: Possess
Space: Jump

Credits:
pontifus: art, music, text
otoutochan: programming

Other Credits:
Softball Gold font by somepx
Some sounds from royalty-free sources
